---
title: Message
description: Represents a message sent by an agent during a specific round.
---




## Attributes

### message

<PyAttribute type="str" value="" docString="The content of the message." />

### round_num

<PyAttribute type="int" value="" docString="The round number when the message was sent." />

### sender_id

<PyAttribute type="int" value="" docString="The ID of the agent who sent the message." />
